dataList.name: Got Candy?
dataList.desc: Turn Start: in Deployment Order, inflict [CandyForCharon] against 1 enemy without [CandyForCharon]

dataList.name: The Red Aura
dataList.desc:
Encounter Start: Vergilius gains a certain amount of Shield that lasts for the duration of the Encounter
Turn ends when the Shield is broken

dataList.name: Vroom-vroom. Angry now
dataList.desc:
When the Shield is depleted, gains a new pattern
- Fix Speed to 20
- No longer takes any HP damage
